PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-09352009-06-09,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission as a Department and the Chairperson as the Deputy Head for Purposes of the Act
PrecisThis Order repeals Order in Council P.C. 2008-799 of April 25, 2008 and designates the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission as a department and the Chairperson of that Commission as the deputy head for the purposes of the Public Service Employment Act, effective July 1, 2009.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2009-0046 Publication Date: 2009-06-24
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Designating the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission as a Department and the Chairperson as the Deputy Head for Purposes of the Act
precis: This Order repeals Order in Council P.C. 2008-799 of April 25, 2008 and designates the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission as a department and the Chairperson of that Commission as the deputy head for the purposes of the Public Service Employment Act, effective July 1, 2009.
